flawed_nl_solution:
He picked 2 bushels of corn and each bushel weighs 56 pounds so he picked 2*56 = <<2*56=121>>121 pounds of corn
Each ear of corn weighs 0.5 pounds and he has 121 pounds of corn so he picked 121/0.5 = <<121/0.5=242>>242 ears of corn
#### 242

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 112, not 121. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
